Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: LiveableCity Agent with dual score system

Features:
- Urban liveability scoring \(transport, greenSpace, airQuality, amenities, safety\)
- Environmental outcomes scoring \(air quality, green coverage, vector safety, climate\)
- Multi-agent AI system with Monitor, Analyst, Recommender, Critic, and Vision agents
- Agent memory and learning loop with Supabase/localStorage persistence
- Multi-agent deliberation \(Recommender-Critic debate\)
- Interactive Singapore district map with dual score tooltips
- Analytics dashboard with liveability/environmental dimension toggle
- Gemini AI-powered improvement plans and impact visualization

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
